attributes.action: Everyone in Mudford, Somerset should support their local village shop!!
attributes.additional_details: A small amount spent by the majority of the village just once a week will see the store stay open for many years to come.
attributes.background: Mudford Stores was nearly lost for good back in June 2015 until it was purchased at the last minute, saving the shop from closure. Local support is needed to allow the store to thrive and grow, as well as passing trade through the village. Pledge your support now!!
